item.description:
My favorite course right now is ROCKLAND GOLF COURSE in Rockland. This is a great par 3 course for both people who are just learning the game and for those who need some shorter course practice.

Let's play 18 as this may be the last time we get to get out this season

Tee time is 12:45


  • 18 holes - very walkable course
  • Bring all of your clubs - this is not a pitch n putt course
  • Money for greens fees ($27.50 for 18 holes - does not include extras)
  • Sorry there is no driving range at this course...there is a putting green and a pitching area.


Please email me if you have any questions!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot - left hand side of the building - I'll send out my cell # Friday

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Rockland Golf Course
